title: Facebook League Group
body:
Hey guys

A team of League of Legends enthusiasts volunteer their time to manage a Facebook community of League of Legends players to help connect summonses outside the rift.

What you will find in the group

* Amateur tournaments
* Shared game experiences
* New friends
* Experienced high ELO players that want to help you improve

Things you won't find

* Negative game experiences
* Abusive people
* Name and shame posts

The Facebook group is a CLOSED group so you can keep your gaming habits are secret from your family & work colleagues.

To find out more come have a look at the [Facebook group](http://www.facebook.com/groups/OceanicLoL) yourself :)
